name: Universal User Data API
description: Central API access to data in a secure manor.
title: UUD API

header.title: Introduction
header.content:
Introduction

About

Access to this API gives you the ability to view:

  • Users
  • Emails
  • Phones
  • Roles
  • Departments
  • Programs
  • Courses
  • Communities
  • Rooms
  • Buildings
  • Campuses

Responses to API requests are returned in JSON. You will need an API access-key to use this API.
